column1: SaloniaOutskirts_npc_03_A;All I want is to be able to live my own life. Is it so wrong for me to seek my own path
column2: and not strive to become an Architect?

column1: SaloniaOutskirts_npc_03_B;Now what are they doing to us? Well
column3: I don’t care. There’s no way I’ll ever be an Architect!

column2: the time has come when anyone can pursue their dreams! Nothing’s going to stand in my way now. My life is truly my own.

column1: SaloniaOutskirts_npc_03_C_02;Huh? You want to know what my dream is? Why
column2: that’s easy. To live happily ever after
